content.rendered:
Due to the novel CoronaVirus (nCoVid 19), many countries restricted the travel. Update your contact details via Manage booking to receive the latest updates or notifications regarding coronavirus or any updates in ANA Airlines. Customers can also check the website for the latest flight updates, rebooking and refund options.

ANA Airlines – Travel restrictions due to CoronaVirus (nCoVid 19)

  • East Asia
  • South East Asia
  • South Asia/Oceania
  • North America/South America/Hawaii
  • Europe

Passenger who wants refund for the booked flight or rebook the flight on another date, you can contact the travel agent or ANA Airlines office directly.

To know more details for travel restrictions due to CoronaVirus (nCoVid 19) on many countries, visit here
